entry.title: Thursday: Chance of snow. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of snow this morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 08:14 AM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
